title: The Inefficiencies of the Latest Energy Code - Pro Builder
summary: Building codes have improved home energy efficiency, but 2021 International Energy Conservation Code requirements may not yield significant savings to justify costs. Analysis shows long payback periods, particularly for ceiling insulation and continuous wall insulation, raising concerns about cost-effectiveness for consumers. Despite pushback from industry, the Inflation Reduction Act incentivizes adoption of the 2021 IECC, highlighting the need for clear energy equivalency criteria to ensure cost-effectiveness.
product_or_process: 2021 International Energy Conservation Code (IECC) Residential Provisions

title: Global Advanced Phase Change Materials (PCM) Strategic Analysis Report 2023: Growing Demand for Energy ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global advanced phase change materials (PCM) market is projected to reach $6.3 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 19.8% from 2022 to 2030. Building & construction is the leading application market for advanced PCMs, and the growing demand for energy-efficient technology is driving the market growth. Advanced PCMs are also finding growing use in the textile industry and in electronics equipment & components.

title: Neochem Technologies: Driving Sustainable Innovations in the Textile Industry - The Textile Magazine
summary: Neochem Technologies, a company specializing in sustainable chemical solutions for various industries including textiles, has experienced growth due to its commitment to innovation and sustainability. The company prioritizes eco-friendly alternatives that contribute to water and energy conservation while reducing costs for its customers. Neochem Technologies is set to showcase its latest sustainable innovations at the upcoming ITMA Milan 2023.

green_process: TRUE, Neochem Technologies' development of a single bath wash-off solution for Polyester-Cotton dyeing, offering substantial savings in time, energy, water, and labor, qualifies as a green process.

title: Blue Tree Phuket drives ESG Initiatives, Reinforces its Sustainable Entertainment Hub Status - Khaosodenglish
summary: Blue Tree Phuket is an entertainment destination committed to promoting ESG (Environment, Social, Governance) standards in its business operations. Blue Tree Phuket also focuses on waste reduction and community outreach on pollution and plastic waste management.

title: Swaraj launches 'Target' range of light tractors aimed at the growing horticulture segment - Autocar Professional
summary: Swaraj Tractors, the second largest tractor maker in India, has launched a new range of 20-30 horsepower tractors under the brand Target to enter the growing horticulture segment. The Target tractors are designed to navigate tight spaces and minimize crop damage, meeting the needs of farmers with small landholdings. Swaraj plans to use former Indian cricket team captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni as its brand ambassador for the Target range.
